text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.modules.de: This module removed the "Too Expensive!" tip on the anvil and kept the penalty level on the item.
text.autoconfig.zakuro.option.modules.fi: This module fixes the rod's collision box and syncs it to its model.
This module fixes the zombie reinforcement and allows zombies and their variants to spawn clones of themselves, just like the 1.21.2 version does.
